"Good morning!<br>ギャザリングをして順調に<br>食材が集まっ:
"そんな食材を
とってもおいしくって健康的な
料理にする方法があるんですよー。"

"まずは、カフェの店員さんに
お願いしてみてくださいー。"

"フランカさん発案の調理システムで
瞬時に料理ができあがりー！
試してみてくださいねー。"

"By using cooked food items, you
can gain special effects for a while,
such as the following:

Example
Forest Tomato Salad
・Vegetable acquisition and additional harvest
rates slightly increased while harvesting

Tokyo Style Burger
・Immediately recover HP

※Cooked items can be set to the subpalette"

"As you achieve Gathering Achievements,
you will get recipes for new dishes, and the
Culinary Shop's menu will expand.

While a food effect is active, if you
use another dish, it will overwrite
the previous effect."
